overview: Andi Marlina, the 2nd daughter of Andi Baharuddin Mahmud, a successful entrepreneur with Makassar blood and a beautiful Sundanese woman named Lilis. Born and raised in Jakarta, because his father migrated and was successful in Jakarta. Now he has graduated from college and made Makassar his next adventure destination after 3 months of going nowhere because of the death of his older brother Lia. But the real goal of going to Makassar is to find out about the house left by his father, which has been kept secret all this time.  Armed with an address and an old photo of a magnificent house in its time with a large yard bordered by a fence. A large and lonely house, with an iron fence surrounding the house. This house looks neat and well maintained. Lina found a woman who was the same age as her, but with a classic style, wearing a kebaya and sarong and a cold face. Puang Tenri, that is the name of the woman who is said to have been entrusted by her father to look after the house.
title: Dedemit: Diikuti Makhluk Halus
